definition: to lean against or on/to stand by the side of/to come near to/to depend on/to trust/to fuck (vulgar)/traditional military costume drama where the performers wear armor (old)

sentences.english: Lie on your back with your legs spread or raise your knees to your head.
sentences.chinese: 平躺，张开双腿或者把膝盖抬到靠近头部的地方。

sentences.english: Mengsk approached the smaller man and stood before him, an intimidating presence.
sentences.chinese: 蒙克斯以威迫的姿态靠近并站在这位小矮人前面。

sentences.english: Make sure none of the audio components are positioned too close to the TV set.
sentences.chinese: 确认各声频设备是否太靠近电视机。

sentences.english: Ads close to top-of-the-page headlines did well.
sentences.chinese: 靠近页顶标题的广告表现良好。

sentences.english: While the White Swan comes easily to Nina, the dark mysteries of the Black Swan evade her.
sentences.chinese: 当白天鹅靠近妮娜的时候，黑天鹅的隐秘躲在暗处。

sentences.english: Birds fly over oil on the water near Breton Sound Island.
sentences.chinese: 一大群鸟飞越靠近布莱顿水声岛的油渍水域。

sentences.english: A girl passed close to him, and Lieutenant Blandford started.
sentences.chinese: 一个女孩靠近他走过，布兰佛德中尉吃惊地动了一下。

sentences.english: Project is located in the former Central New Film Factory near North Third Ring Road area.
sentences.chinese: 项目选址在原中央新影厂靠近北三环的区域。

sentences.english: The Lord is close to the brokenhearted and saves those who are crushed in spirit.
sentences.chinese: 耶和华靠近伤心的人，拯救灵性痛悔的人。

sentences.english: Rajin-Sonbong (or Rason, for short) lies by the Sea of Japan in the country’s north-east, near the border with Russia.
sentences.chinese: 罗津靠近日本海，在北韩的东北部，接近俄国边界。

sentences.english: Don't put the fermentation container close to potting plants.
sentences.chinese: 发酵容器不能靠近盆栽植物放置。

sentences.english: Lie face down on the floor with your elbows bent and your palms next to your shoulders.
sentences.chinese: 脸朝地板向下，肘关节弯曲，手心靠近肩膀。

sentences.english: Iron at temperatures close to and above its critical temperature has an affinity for carbon.
sentences.chinese: 铁在靠近并高于其临界温度时对碳具有亲合力。

sentences.english: The staggering totals indicate why McGrady needed to get to the hoop.
sentences.chinese: 摇摆不定的数据表明了为什么麦迪需要更靠近篮圈。

sentences.english: I'll walk, trot , canter or gallop to be near you.
sentences.chinese: 我会步行，小跑，慢跑或驰骋在靠近你。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, Seret had inched along the car toward Stephen.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，塞里特沿着汽车一点一点地靠近了史蒂芬。

definition: to be right next to/to lean closely against
to touch/(fig.) to touch on (a matter)
to be far from/to keep away from
to press close to/to snuggle close/intimate
to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲
to cross over/to transcend/to cover distance/to overcome/to rise above
to detour/to bypass/to circumvent/to avoid/to wind around (of a road etc)
